name: Numix - Pidgin Tray Icons

screenshots.caption: A preview of the icons, which are contained by the "Numix - Pidgin Tray Icons" icon set

short_description:
"Numix - Pidgin Tray Icons" is a icon set for the Linux GNOME-shell, whose purpose is to be used as tray icons for the instant messenger "Pidgin". The icon pack ships with different icons, that visualize all possible states, the application may be in. It contains various icons, that visualize the user's status, a icon, that indicates unread mails, a icon, that indicates unread messages, a icon, that indicates pending friend requests and a icon, that is shown when the messenger connects to the server.

This icon set has been created to be used together with the GTK-theme "Numix" and has been designed to optically fit into the appearance of the "Numix"-theme and the accompanying "Numix-uTouch"-icon theme.
summary: A GNOME icon set, which contains tray icons for "Pidgin"
